channel.title: LLA Roborunners
channel.description: Loma Linda Academy's FTC team, the 7092 Roborunners. We are a third-year FTC robotics team, based out of Loma Linda, California.

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Welcome to the new Roborunners website! This site is intended to serve as a resource for both our team internally and the FTC community, as well as those interested in the FTC as a whole. We intend document progress here, share findings as we work on our robots, and highlight our competitions.

As to who we are, we are a third-year FTC team from Loma Linda, California. This season marks our first real year of ‘experience,’ and we are excited to get started.
